name: Lemon Grove
shortDescription: Charming suburban city known for its historic Lemon Grove Arch and tight-knit community near San Diego.
fullDescription: Lemon Grove offers affordable suburban living with a strong sense of community, highlighted by its iconic Lemon Grove Arch. Residents enjoy convenient access to both San Diego and East County amenities while maintaining a distinct small-town character with local events and parks.
heroImageAlt: Lemon Grove Arch with suburban neighborhood

neighborhoods.name: La Mesa
neighborhoods.description: Adjacent city with historic downtown village and walkable neighborhoods.

neighborhoods.name: San Diego
neighborhoods.description: Major metropolitan center with employment hubs and cultural attractions.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: San Diego skyline viewed from the bay

neighborhoods.name: El Cajon
neighborhoods.description: Neighboring city with diverse dining options and affordable housing.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Downtown street scene in El Cajon

neighborhoods.name: National City
neighborhoods.description: Urban city to the southwest with bayfront access and diverse dining.

highlights.title: Historic Arch
highlights.description: The iconic Lemon Grove Arch has welcomed visitors since 1928 as a symbol of community pride.

highlights.title: Community Events
highlights.description: Annual Lemon Festival and other local gatherings foster small-town connections.

highlights.title: Affordable Living
highlights.description: More budget-friendly than neighboring cities while offering convenient location.

highlights.title: Central Location
highlights.description: Easy access to both San Diego and East County via I-94 and SR-125.

faqs.question: What are the best neighborhoods in Lemon Grove?
faqs.answer: Popular areas include the downtown area near the Arch, Palm Ranch, and neighborhoods near San Miguel Elementary.

faqs.question: How are the schools in Lemon Grove?
faqs.answer: Served by the Lemon Grove School District and Grossmont Union High School District with several award-winning schools.

faqs.question: What is there to do in Lemon Grove?
faqs.answer: Enjoy community events like the Lemon Festival, local parks, and easy access to San Diego attractions.

faqs.question: How is commuting to downtown San Diego?
faqs.answer: About 15-20 minutes via I-94 depending on traffic, with trolley access from nearby La Mesa.
